metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18197 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In mxGraphViewImageReader.java in mxGraph before 3.7.6, the SAXParserFactory instance in convert() is missing flags to prevent XML External Entity (XXE) attacks, as demonstrated by /ServerView.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-18197` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjgraphx-java - 2.1.0.7-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjgraphx-java package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.0.7-2').
